member.name: T:TextEditor.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:TextEditor.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:TextEditor.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:TextEditor.frmEditor.AttemptingToClose(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: AttemptingToClose - If the user presses 'X', checks to see if any text has been changed

member.name: M:TextEditor.frmEditor.AboutApplication(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: AboutApplication - Displays the information about the application

member.name: M:TextEditor.frmEditor.ExitApplication(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: ExitApplication - Determines if the file can save or not - If text has been edited, go to the SaveFileAs subroutine

member.name: M:TextEditor.frmEditor.OpenFile(System.String)
member.summary: OpenFile - Open a new file, determined by the user
member.param: The location of the file on the hard drive

member.name: M:TextEditor.frmEditor.SaveFile(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: SaveFile - If the file exists, saves it to the current path, otherwise, go to the SaveFileAs() subroutine

member.name: M:TextEditor.frmEditor.SaveFileAs(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: SaveFileAs - Allows the user to pick the location of the file and saves the current text to previousText

member.name: M:TextEditor.frmEditor.CheckText
member.summary: CheckText - Determines if the text has been changed
member.returns: state: boolean - False if text has been changed, true if it has not been motified

member.name: P:TextEditor.frmEditor.GetPath
member.summary: GetPath() - Sets or returns the location of the given file
member.returns: path: string - The location of the file
